name: 堕魔的伊米娅（Fallen Emiya）
description:
This game talks about a story of the Brave Emiya who destoried the Dark Lord. But after that Emiya cursed, and became a mixed devil. At the same time, she chased by human beings who didn't knew the truth. So Emiya was determined to find a way to lift the curse. The player's choice will decide the ending of Emiya. Game Features:
  • Carefully drawn CG, with the corresponding special events that make people boil.
  • Depending on the armor, there will be a corresponding vertical drawing, of course you can choose not to wear it.
  • A good story to immerse you in, even when you sleep, you can still remember it.
  • A simple and straightforward way to play, but you still need to pay attention to the details in order to reach a good ending.
  • The game doesn't have achievements, and it won't drop cards. I don't think you are coming to this.
  • If you accidentally enter the Sage mode, hopefully this will not affect your evaluation of the game.
